message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $115?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to compromise and meet you at $110. Would you be willing to consider that?
I'm really close to making a decision, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $110. Would you be willing to meet me at $100?
I understand your hesitation, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make one more compromise and meet you at $108. Would you be willing to consider that?
I'm afraid I'm not willing to pay more than $100. I'm going to have to pass on this deal.
